mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_operation_log ( username, ip_address, module, operation_type, description, request_url, request_method, execute_method, request_params, response_result, execute_time, operation_time, status, exception_msg ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{ipAddress}, #{module}, #{operationType}, #{description}, #{requestUrl}, #{requestMethod}, #{executeMethod}, #{requestParams}, #{responseResult}, #{executeTime}, NOW(), #{status}, #{exceptionMsg} )
